Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Basal cell carcinoma (a type of skin cancer). It is used in adults whose disease has metastasized (spread to other parts of the body). It is also used in adults with locally advanced disease that has recurred (come back) after surgery or who cannot be treated with surgery or radiation.

Section.Para: Vismodegib is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
